skills.skillDescription: Designing from low-fidelity sketches to coded prototypes.
Conducting participant recruitment, interviews, and workshops.
Experience with tools like Figma, Sketch, Framer, Illustrator, and Fusion 360.
Specialising in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6 + React), and Python.
Expertise in 3D printing, laser cutting/CNC, PCB design, and programming.
